body:
Thanks, 

I prefer it to be an official option, is it possible to enable this option in the next release?

> I prefer it to be an official option, is it possible to enable this option in the next release?

I'm asking if you'd like to have a go at making a pull request to implement this.  We could certainly get that into the next release :-)
Yes, but I would like an official developer to do it :-), and be available in the next version. Thanks four your support

> > I prefer it to be an official option, is it possible to enable this option in the next release?
> 
> I'm asking if you'd like to have a go at making a pull request to implement this. We could certainly get that into the next release :-)

Is it possible that you development it for the next version? :-)

Try this - it has a `--sftp-skip-links` flag

https://beta.rclone.org/branch/v1.50.1-046-g39418c74-fix-3716-sftp-links-beta/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

> Try this - it has a `--sftp-skip-links` flag
> 
> https://beta.rclone.org/branch/v1.50.1-046-g39418c74-fix-3716-sftp-links-beta/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

Thanks you very much, 

I'm going to test this beta version

Will this option be enabled in the next stable version?

> Try this - it has a `--sftp-skip-links` flag
> 
> https://beta.rclone.org/branch/v1.50.1-046-g39418c74-fix-3716-sftp-links-beta/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

Hi, I have find a bug.

option --sftp-skip-links is working correctly with symbolic links, but if I use the option to synchronize, it is deleting file in the destination that regular files

> option --sftp-skip-links is working correctly with symbolic links, but if I use the option to synchronize, it is deleting file in the destination that regular files

That is what `rclone sync` does - it deletes files in the destination that don't exist in the source.  By using `--sftp-skip-links` those files effectively disappear from the source so rclone deletes them in the destination.  They were probably copies of files copied through the symlink I imagine.

> > option --sftp-skip-links is working correctly with symbolic links, but if I use the option to synchronize, it is deleting file in the destination that regular files
> 
> That is what `rclone sync` does - it deletes files in the destination that don't exist in the source. By using `--sftp-skip-links` those files effectively disappear from the source so rclone deletes them in the destination. They were probably copies of files copied through the symlink I imagine.

 Yes, I understand the sync. 

The problem is that with the option --sftp-skip-links, is deleting regular files in the destination (onedrive) that if they are in the source (sftp). If I try it with option -skip-links working correcly, destination (onedrive) / source (local).

Thanks for your help and support
Can you send a log with `-vv` illustrating what you mean please?

> Can you send a log with `-vv` illustrating what you mean please? For example, Execution with --sftp-skip-links. Delete several files in destination In Source the file exists It also shows these errors the execution Thanks for your help Regards
Can you attach a complete log please?  I can't really see what is going on there.  Or if you don't want to make it public email it to nick@craig-wood.com with a link to this issue - thanks.

> Can you attach a complete log please? I can't really see what is going on there. Or if you don't want to make it public email it to [nick@craig-wood.com](mailto:nick@craig-wood.com) with a link to this issue - thanks.

Hi, I sent to you a mail with logs. Thanks

Thanks for the log :-)

I have found the problem with that I think - please have a go with this

https://beta.rclone.org/branch/v1.50.2-057-g5269705c-fix-3716-sftp-links-beta/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

Thanks for your patience!

> Thanks for the log :-)
> 
> I have found the problem with that I think - please have a go with this
> 
> https://beta.rclone.org/branch/v1.50.2-057-g5269705c-fix-3716-sftp-links-beta/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)
> 
> Thanks for your patience!

I'm going to try it

Thanks

> Thanks for the log :-)
> 
> I have found the problem with that I think - please have a go with this
> 
> https://beta.rclone.org/branch/v1.50.2-057-g5269705c-fix-3716-sftp-links-beta/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)
> 
> Thanks for your patience!

Hi, beta version is working  correctly :-). Are you going to include it in the stable version?

Thank you very much
I've merged this to master now which means it will be in [the latest beta](https://beta.rclone.org) in 15-30 mins and released in v1.51
